sentences.en: And all the pins of the tabernacle, and of the court round about, were of brass.
sentences.cn: 帐幕一切的橛子和院子四围的 橛子 都是铜的.

sentences.en: And for the rear of the tabernacle westward he made six boards.
sentences.cn: 27帐幕的后面,就是西面,作六块板.

sentences.en: And for the sides of the tabernacle westward he made six boards.
sentences.cn: 27帐幕的后面,就是西面,作板六块.

sentences.en: And he made boards for the tabernacle of shittim wood, standing up.
sentences.cn: 出36:20他用皂荚木作帐幕的竖板.

sentences.en: And he set up the hanging at the door of the tabernacle.
sentences.cn: 在会幕的帐幕门前,安设燔祭坛,把燔祭和素祭献在其上,是照耶和华所吩咐他的.

sentences.en: Asas the cloud stayed over the tabernacle, they remained in camp.
sentences.cn: 云彩在帐幕上停住几时, 他们就住营几时.

sentences.en: He was forbidden to walk into the tabernacle.
In Salem also is his tabernacle, and his dwelling place in Zion.
sentences.cn: 在撒冷有他的帐幕, 在锡安有他的居所.

sentences.en: It look as if some supernatural were tabernacle in him.
sentences.cn: 好像是什麽神秘的东西暂附于他的肉体.

sentences.en: Make curtains of goat hair for the tent over the tabernacle - eleven altogether.
sentences.cn: 你要用山羊毛织十一幅幔子,作为帐幕以上的罩棚.

sentences.en: NIV They made upright frames of acacia wood for the tabernacle.
sentences.cn: [和合]他用6皂荚木作帐幕的7竖板.

sentences.en: No one know who tabernacle the holy bread and wine.
sentences.cn: 谁也不知道是谁把圣面包和酒置于到神龛中了.

sentences.en: The cave seem to is the best place to tabernacle in this weather.
sentences.cn: 在这种天气下,这个洞穴看来是暂居的最佳地.

sentences.en: The families of the Gershonites shall pitch behind the tabernacle westward.
sentences.cn: 23这革顺的二族要在帐幕后西边安营.

sentences.en: They made upright frames of acacia wood for the tabernacle.
sentences.cn: 他用6皂荚木作帐幕的7竖板.

trans.tran_cn: 临时房屋，帐篷，身体，壁龛
trans.tran_en: a church or other building used by some Christian groups as a place of  worship
